title: Hardest Snowballing Champion? (snowballing the hardest, nothing to do with difficulty)
body:
What are the hardest snowballing champions?
Hardest as in they snowball the hardest, not necessarily hard to play

Who can just get rolling easily after a few kills?
I know about champs like Yasuo, Rengar, Tryn, Riven etc, but are there any less conventional snowballers? I'm thinking Jarvan IV etc

these champions are all pretty damage oriented and have ways to fight but also either get out, tank it or cc you. They do alot of damage but can also be very hard to kill due to stealth, lifesteal, mobility, cc or in a few cases just because they'll 100-0 you before you can do anything to fight back. That isn't to say that other champions can snowball because even a janna/soraka can snowball if she has enough kills+assists+levels to the point where she can 1v1 the enemy midlaner; but I feel these champions have really strong game ending potential if they get ahead and are really hard to win against if they're fed.
